Jinjamator uses Celery as a distributed task queue. For optimal operation Celery needs RabbitMQ as a message broker.

Install RabbitMQ.

sudo apt install rabbitmq

(optional) Enable RabbitMQ autostart.

sudo systemctl enable rabbitmq-server

Start RabbitMQ service.

sudo systemctl start rabbitmq-server

Create a RabbitMQ virtual host.

sudo rabbitmqctl add_vhost jinjamator

Create a RabbitMQ user and set permissions.

sudo rabbitmqctl add_user jinjamator superSecretPassword
sudo rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p jinjamator jinjamator ".*" ".*" ".*"
